text: News of the World is the seventh studio album from the English rock band Queen, released in 1977. ==Track listing== #We Will Rock You #We Are the Champions #Sheer Heart Attack #All Dead, All Dead #Spread Your Wings #Fight from the Inside #Get Down, Make Love #Sleeping on the Sidewalk #Who Needs You #It's Late #My Melancholy Blues Category:Queen (band) albums Category:1977 albums Category:Rock albums Category:Elektra Records albums
title: News of the World (album)
